Experienced Advocates For Car Accident Victims

At Lamkin, Van Eman, Trimble & Dougherty, LLC, we have the skills and experience to offer real relief to victims of motor vehicle accidents. With more than 100 years of combined experience, our team of Columbus attorneys has recovered multimillion-dollar verdicts and settlement for individuals all throughout Ohio who were in your same situation. We know how to thoroughly investigate these accidents to build the strongest case possible for you.

Handling Every Type Of Accident

Every car accident is unique. Car accidents may be caused by driving while intoxicated, failing to yield, mechanical failure and, especially in recent years, distracted driving. Despite laws restricting cellphone use behind the wheel in Ohio, texting and taking selfies while driving remain serious problems. Individuals getting rides from Uber, Lyft and Sidecar drivers have also been involved in accidents. Our firm has the skills and the resources to take on cases involving any accident. Let us help you.

Attaining Full And Fair Compensation For You

If you or a loved one has been injured in a car accident due to the negligent actions of another driver, you are entitled to seek compensation to pay for your injuries. If the accident led to the death of a close family member, we can also advise you on filing a wrongful death claim. Our goal is to obtain a full and fair financial recovery that will help you move forward with your life. We will use our knowledge to get to the bottom of what happened to you and will not hesitate to advocate aggressively for the compensation you deserve.

Call Us Today For A Free Consultation

When you or a loved one has been seriously injured in a motor vehicle accident, you need to know that the lawyer you choose will provide you the best chance of securing the full compensation you deserve. Turn to our skilled and experienced personal injury attorneys to handle your claim. Schedule a free initial consultation today. Call 614-360-2706 or send us an email. We collect attorneys’ fees only if we recover compensation for you.
